languages.text: "Раз они такие живучие и боевитые, пусть охраняют ульи в обмен на малую дань".
"If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
languages.original_text: "Раз они такие живучие и боевитые, пусть охраняют ульи в обмен на малую дань".

traits.locale_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
"If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
"If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
"If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
"If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
"If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."

languages.text: “既然他们这么顽强好战，就让他们负责看守巢都，以此换取一点点酬劳吧。”
languages.original_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."

traits.locale_text: “既然他们这么顽强好战，就让他们负责看守巢都，以此换取一点点酬劳吧。”

languages.text: «Si son tan tenaces y militantes, que vigilen las colmenas a cambio de un pequeño tributo».
languages.original_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."

traits.locale_text: «Si son tan tenaces y militantes, que vigilen las colmenas a cambio de un pequeño tributo».

languages.text: 「そんなに粘り強くて戦闘能力に秀でているなら、わずかな報酬と引き換えにハイヴを護衛させればいいのだ」
languages.original_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに粘り強くて戦闘能力に秀でているなら、わずかな報酬と引き換えにハイヴを護衛させればいいのだ」

languages.text: « S'ils sont si coriaces, qu'ils gardent les ruches en échange d'un petit tribut. »
languages.original_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."

traits.locale_text: « S'ils sont si coriaces, qu'ils gardent les ruches en échange d'un petit tribut. »

languages.text: "Wenn sie so hartnäckig und militant sind, sollen sie doch im Tausch gegen einen kleinen Tribut die Makropolen bewachen."
languages.original_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn sie so hartnäckig und militant sind, sollen sie doch im Tausch gegen einen kleinen Tribut die Makropolen bewachen."

languages.text: "Madem o kadar inatçılar ve militan zihniyetindeler, o hâlde ufak bir ödeme karşılığında kovanları korusunlar."
languages.original_text: "If they are so tenacious and militant, let them guard the hives in exchange for a small tribute."
